person_crime:
UA37432 / POSSESS MARIJUANA 1 OZ OR LESS-2ND OFFENSE
UA37432 / POSSESS OR USE DRUG PARAPHERNALIA
synopsis: On 03/04/2016, Mitchell Johnson was contacted after his room was discovered to have the smell of marijuana emitting from it. A consent search of the room yielded a pipe with burned marijuana residue and a jar containing .9gram of marijuana. He was cited and released for possession of marijuana

A University of Nebraska-Lincoln engineering Department staff member reported the belated theft or loss of two tools from one of the work shops in Othmer Hall. The items were believed to have been lost or taken sometime over the past seven day. Investigation continues.
